title: Braun Series 7 electric shaver – An innovative shaving technology
description:
Want to know about the Braun Series 7? - The technologically advanced electric shaver for men. Its revolutionary Sonic Technology automatically adjusts its power to the density of your beard and delivers an exceptional 10,000 micro-vibrations with every stroke - for the ultimate thorough and comfortable shave.

Furthermore, the Braun Series 7 combines uncompromising German engineering and manufacture with world-famous Braun design.

asset.title: Braun Series 7 electric shaver – An innovative shaving technology
asset.description:
Want to know about the Braun Series 7? - The technologically advanced electric shaver for men. Its revolutionary Sonic Technology automatically adjusts its power to the density of your beard and delivers an exceptional 10,000 micro-vibrations with every stroke - for the ultimate thorough and comfortable shave.

Furthermore, the Braun Series 7 combines uncompromising German engineering and manufacture with world-famous Braun design.

Find out more at: http://www.braun.com/global/male-grooming/series-shavers/series-7.html
asset.author: Braun

transcripts: Braun Series 7. The world's only intelligent sonic technology. Reads your face and adapts to the density of your beard. 10,000 micro vibrations. Capture more hair with every stroke fro Braun's most thorough and comfortable shave. Brown's personalization modes, two intensities for a more individual shave. Extra sensitive, intensive, an adjustable shave that fits best your beard and skin. Braun's fully flexible shaving system. A unique combination of pivoting shaver head and floating cutting elements for maximum facial adaptability. Braun's patented AciveLift. Unique oscillating middle trimmer with 130 movements per second. Lifts and cuts flat laying hairs for a thorough shave in problem areas. Braun's most advanced OptiFoil. Ergonomically designed foil holes consistently capture hair all over the foil. to cut hair deeper than ever before. Braun's Triple Action Cutting System. Three individual cutting elements work simultaneously cutting long hair as easily as short hair. Braun shavers are 100% water proof and fully washable -- easy to clean under running water. Braun Series 7.
